description: These muffins have a light crunchy exterior and a fluffy banana filled centre.
keywords: Sweet muffin,Banana,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Crunchy Banana Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g unsalted butter, room temperature (keep some for the baking dish)

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the butter with the sugar and eggs and combine fully.
Add the salt and baking powder, soda, allspice, salt and incrementally add the flour.
Lastly fold in the mashed bananas and use some milk to loosen the batter if needed.
Lightly butter 6 muffin tins and empty the dough in and level out. Bake for 25 minutes or until cooked through.
